seodesc: Gain deeper insights into your applications with Logs.Our advanced embedded Graphical User Interface (GUI) for searching logs is designed to help you easily and quickly find the logs of significance that you need.

items.title: Log everything
items.desc:
• Pay as you go, with 140x lower storage costs of other log providers
  • 30 day default storage and much longer storage capabilities
  • No worries of hot vs cold tier for storage
  • Search everything with scalable search functionality

items.title: Find and fix your problems faster
items.desc:
• Search logs quickly with advanced GUI
  • Quickly see logs, metrics and traces and a single dashboard
  • Pinpoint performance and availability issues by detecting common patterns,trends, and outliers
  • Gain complete visibility into your servers, virtual machines, and containers with a purpose-built interface for log monitoring

items.title: Process, enrich, redact, and reduce logs
items.desc:
• Enrich log data
  • Process incoming logs. Join fields, drop fields and more
  • Remove unwanted fields cutting noise and storage costs

items.title: Ensure automated compliance
items.desc:
• Redact sensitive data like SSN, email and more
  • Use existing patterns or build your own
  • Stop haggling with developers on compliance
